title: Deposit Policy
content: A $25 non-refundable deposit is required for all bookings to secure your appointment. This deposit goes towards the total cost of your service. No deposit means your slot is not secured.

title: Punctuality
content: Please arrive on time. Being more than 7 minutes late will result in a $10 fee. If you are 12 or more minutes late, your appointment will be automatically cancelled, and the deposit will not be refunded.

title: Cancellations & Rescheduling
content: A minimum of 24 hours notice is required to reschedule or cancel your appointment. Each booking includes one free reschedule if notice is given within the required timeframe.

title: No-Shows & Late Cancellations
content: No-shows or cancellations within 24 hours of the appointment will forfeit their deposit. A new deposit of 50% of the service price will be required to rebook.

title: Fill Eligibility
content: To qualify for a fill, you must have at least 40% of your lashes remaining for a 2-week fill, and at least 30% for a 3-week fill. Anything less will be considered a new set.

title: Health & Preparation
content: Please arrive with clean lashes and no eye makeup, or a $5 cleaning fee will be applied. Avoid caffeine before your appointment. Remove contact lenses. If you are sick, please reschedule.

title: Payments
content: Deposits are accepted via Zelle or Cash App. The remaining balance must be paid in cash at the time of your appointment.

title: Guests & Parking
content: Please do not bring any guests without prior confirmation. Parking details will be provided with your appointment confirmation.

title: Foreign Fills
content: We do not accept foreign fills from other artists unless pre-approved. A removal and a new set will be required.
